thread.title: Stephen Colbert Parodies Stephen Miller’s Vow To 'Go On Any Show, Anywhere, Any Time' | The Huffington Post
thread.title_full: Stephen Colbert Parodies Stephen Miller’s Vow To 'Go On Any Show, Anywhere, Any Time' | The Huffington Post

author: Rebecca Shapiro
title: Stephen Colbert Parodies Stephen Miller’s Vow To 'Go On Any Show, Anywhere, Any Time' | The Huffington Post
text:
Stephen Colbert Parodies Stephen Miller’s Vow To 'Go On Any Show, Anywhere, Any Time' From "Stranger Things" to "Game of Thrones." 02/14/2017 05:31 am ET Rebecca Shapiro Senior Editor, The Huffington Post 
Stephen Colbert took President Donald Trump ’s senior advisor Stephen Miller at his word Monday night. 
Miller spent Sunday morning making the rounds on network news shows, defending the president’s lie that “millions” of people had voted illegally. 
“I’m prepared to go on any show, anywhere, any time and repeat it and say the president of the United States is correct, 100 percent,” he said. 
So the “Late Show” host imagined what, exactly, that would look like. 
Take a look in the video above. Also on HuffPost
